author: @test-so7qg
text: I was about to run "sips" command but I've got this error: sips --version Command 'sips' not found, did you mean:   command 'sipp' from deb sip-tester (1:3.6.1-1build1)   command 'ips' from deb ips (4.0-1.1)   command 'sip' from deb sip-dev (4.19.25+dfsg-3build1)   command 'vips' from deb libvips-tools (8.12.1-1build1) Try: sudo apt install <deb name>  but it's a built-in command, isn't it?
